actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to make children of migratory seasonal fishermen eligible for the same programs now afforded to children of migratory agricultural workers.

summary.text: Makes children of migratory seasonal fishermen eligible under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act for the programs now afforded to children of migratory agricultural workers. (Amends 20 U.S.C. 241e(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to make children of migratory seasonal fishermen eligible for the same programs now afforded to children of migratory agricultural workers.
